about:
I am a Computer Science Student From Vishwakarma University. I am a passionate Software Developer with experience in building scalable and user-friendly web applications.  I specialize in frontend and backend development using Next.js, React, TypeScript, Node.js, and Supabase. I enjoy solving complex problems, exploring emerging technologies, and building innovative solutions. 

 Winner of the Decentralized Identity Foundation Hackathon 2024, I am always eager to learn and contribute to impactful projects.
